Text.Language: Je piatcarx af[icarx: ouoh pilogoc afq~yai: piatar,/ aferh/tc: piatc/ou afswpi qa ou,~ronoc.
The One without flesh became flesh / and the Logos became incarnate; / the One without beginning was born / the One outside of time became subject to time.
لأن الغير متجسد تجسد والكلمة تجسم غير المبتدئ ابتدأ وغير الزمني صار تحت الزمان.
